snippet: Lucas van Praag, who oversaw public relations during one of the most tumultuous periods in the history of Goldman Sachs, is stepping down at the end of March.
abstract: Lucas van Praag, who oversaw public relations during one of the most tumultuous periods in the history of Goldman Sachs, is stepping down at the end of March.
lead_paragraph: It's official - Goldman Sachs's public relations chief, Lucas van Praag, is retiring from the firm next month.
